version_description:
* Added new routing, dispatch, and messaging features
* Bug fixes and improvements reported by drivers in the Samsara Family

* Added new routing, dispatch, and messaging features
* Bug fixes and improvements reported by drivers in the Samsara Family

Streamlined Duty Status Selection: We have redesigned the Duty Status selection screen to help drivers change their duty status more seamlessly.

Simplified HoS Log Edits: We have improved the layout and streamlined the process for editing HoS logs. Now, your drivers will find it easier and quicker to maintain accurate records and stay in compliance.

Improved HoS Dials: Based on your feedback, we added a fourth dial on the HoS screen so drivers can directly see their remaining available drive time.

Faster Vehicle Selection: We want to make it easy for drivers to get into their vehicles and get going. We’re making vehicle selection easier by: 1) allowing drivers to see which vehicle hotspot their mobile device is connected to, and 2) giving drivers the option to filter out vehicles that are more than 5 miles away.

Enhanced Performance & Design: We’re constantly looking for ways to make our app faster and easier to use. We’ve made a number of performance improvements to reduce transition time between screens, maintain app stability, and improve legibility.

Improved HoS Dials: Based on your feedback, we added a fourth dial on the HoS screen so drivers can directly see their remaining available drive time.

We’re making vehicle selection easier by: 1) allowing drivers to see which vehicle hotspot their mobile device is connected to, and 2) giving drivers the option to filter out vehicles that are more than 5 miles away.

Enhanced Performance & Design: We’re constantly looking for ways to make our app faster and easier to use. We’ve made a number of performance improvements to reduce transition time between screens, maintain app stability, and improve legibility.

Messaging Notifications: Our latest improvement to Messaging ensures that your drivers receive the right message at the right time. Now, drivers can see messages from Dispatch, even when the Samsara Driver App is minimized.

Easier Log Edits: Viewing and making corrections to daily logs in the Samsara Driver App is now easier than ever before! Start time, end time, duty status and location for each log segment are now listed and entire segments can be modified at a time.

Documents: Drivers can take photos of delivery receipts, bills of lading, fuel receipts, and more using just the camera on their smartphone or tablet. Photos, notes, and relevant data are instantly uploaded to the Samsara Dashboard.

Language selection: We’ve added support for French and Spanish; now, your drivers can use the Samsara Driver App in the language they prefer. Language preferences can be adjusted directly from the app settings page.

Messaging
● Admins can now send clickable URLs in messages, so that drivers can easily navigate to relevant websites on their mobile device
● Audible 'ding' to let drivers know that they have received a message

Compliance
● Changed the cycle clock to be synced with the drive and shift clocks, so that drivers will never be confused about how much time they have left to work

Routes
● Enabled the splitting of arrival and departure times for manual route stop arrival to give drivers more control about communicating when they have arrived to and departed from stops
● Drivers can now see the routes of their team driving counterpart to give them better visibility about where their current route will be taking them

General
● Fixed a bug where user information would not carry over on the log-in screen between updates
